title: Nice and Easy
description: A hot firefighter who just wants to take care of her and her little boy? Sign her up.  Moving in with him and his little girl who already has a huge chunk of her heart? Very nice.  Roommates with benefits? Yes, please.  Convincing this take-charge alpha to let her take care of him too? Thatâ€™s not going to be as easy.
author: Erin Nicholas
